blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: the level of absolute awfulness people on idb spew when they're feeling righteously angry is crazy. like if you're a grown ass...
question: the level of absolute awfulness people on idb spew when they're feeling righteously angry is crazy. like if you're a grown ass adult and you feel comfortable accusing someone whose a mental health ambassador of faking depressive episodes in order to court sympathy and emotionally manipulate his fan base you've actually lost the plot and crossed over to a place of being an openly shitty human being
answer: Oh wow, I had not seen that. Obviously I think those accusations are really off-base. I am not in the camp of people who think Dan and Phil have gotten more open with their audience over time (I think the opposite actually), but Dan really put himself out there and shared something raw and personal in Daniel and Depression and it always makes me sad to see people use that against him, whether it be in ways like this or the opposite, when people feel the need to inject mental health struggles into every aspect of his life and treat him like he is exceedingly fragile because of it. It’s all really below the belt as far as I’m concerned. There seems to be a big lack of self-awareness in the phandom (not just talking about IDB here) where people don’t seem to realize that every time they use personal information that Dan has shared against him, they are consistently reinforcing to him that he can’t trust us enough to share things with us, which is what most of the phandom wants him to do. I just really dislike how much people exploit Dan’s admission that he struggles with depression, especially since he was very clear that he didn’t want it to be used to define him. It’s dirty and only serves to stigmatize mental health further.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: what do you think about those posts? i feel like some of the criticism people express there is fair, but some parts are really...
question: what do you think about those posts? i feel like some of the criticism people express there is fair, but some parts are really exaggerated, to the point where it's plain hateful. comparing phil to the paul brothers and thinking he gets too many views now? being "disgusted" by dan's prank? ridiculous twitter*.*com/stormerdnp/status/1113127556423847936
answer: It’s IDB so I’m not surprised. Like don’t get me wrong I’ve got plenty of my own criticisms about the way Dan and Phil are handling things right now but those people are just being weirdly rude about it. If it really bothers them that much, what are they doing writing exaggerated hateful posts about it? Like literally just unsubscribe and go watch something else. It really is that easy.

reblog.comment: It’s IDB so I’m not surprised. summary: Why act like Dan hasn't said exactly what you claim you want from him? "I don't have a set plan I need to figure it out" "now...
question: Why act like Dan hasn't said exactly what you claim you want from him? "I don't have a set plan I need to figure it out" "now that we’ve finished our tour i intend to think about how i can be more like the person i want to be” & "I'm not in a rush to put myself out there a lot cause i’m at this point in life currently where i feel like i’m growing a lot as a person all the time like rapidly. like i look back at my life 3 months ago & i’m like ew so i’m happy to be in a cocoon until i'm ready"
answer: Yes, he has said all of those things. How long ago? I’m not saying he hasn’t in the past done exactly what I’m asking of him. I’m just saying I’d like for him to continue. I think the last time he said anything legitimate on the issue was the tumblr answer time they did. And how many months ago was that? If he’s really growing and changing that rapidly he could have totally different plans or opinions by now. So an update would be nice.

reblog.comment: Yes, he has said all of those things. How long ago? I’m not saying he hasn’t in the past done exactly what I’m asking of him. I’m just saying I’d like for him to continue. summary: Did your opinions about dnp changed after ii era?
question: Did your opinions about dnp changed after ii era?
answer: Kind of? I’m not as big of a fan as I once was. And I had kind of prepared for that when they announced the tour because I knew I wasn’t interested in seeing them perform live, and couldn’t anyway because everybody hates Canada and only does like two cities on the complete opposite end of the country. So I knew that I wasn’t going to be seeing much of them and my interest would inevitably drift off to other things. But what I didn’t expect, was to see even less of them after the tour. I expected maybe a month of recuperation and silence from them, and then business as usual. And instead, Dan dropped off the face of the earth, they cancelled every tradition and stopped doing joint content and the only thing that’s gone back to “normal” is that Phil is uploading.

And instead, Dan dropped off the face of the earth, they cancelled every tradition and stopped doing joint content and the only thing that’s gone back to “normal” is that Phil is uploading.

body:
So…

HowToBasic’s April fools vid gave us coordinates to Canning River Regional Park (coordinates being -32.0214 115.9154)

We now need to find someone to go there.

Anybody live near there?

So…

HowToBasic’s April fools vid gave us coordinates to Canning River Regional Park (coordinates being -32.0214 115.9154)

We now need to find someone to go there.

Anybody live near there?

summary: I’ve been loving the prompts people have submitted and what you have done with them. For a prompt: Phil enjoying Dan’s stubble
question: I’ve been loving the prompts people have submitted and what you have done with them. For a prompt: Phil enjoying Dan’s stubble
answer:
(Thank you so much! ☺️)

Phil was already in bed under the warmth of the duvet when he head the front door open, then close. The gentle noise was followed by the soft sounds of with socked feet climbing the carpeted stairs.

It wasn’t long before he felt the mattress dip, a warm weight settle into the space behind him, and a strong, tan arm curl around his midsection.

He gave a soft hum, his voice quiet and scratch from where he had been on the edge of sleep. “You’re late.”

A fond chuckle ghosted over his cheek as Dan nuzzled his face softly into his pale, bare shoulder. “I’m away visiting family for three weeks, and I’m greeted with "you’re late”. Charming.“

Phil turned in his arms as the wrapped around him, burrowing into his warmth nuzzling his cheek with his face. He smiled softly when he felt the gentle scratch of Dan’s stubble on his skin.

"And you haven’t shaved.”

Dan smiled and tilted Phil’s chin up, catching his lips in a tired, lazy kiss. He felt Phil sigh softly as his chin brushed his skin, pulling away to press soft kisses on his jaw and down his pale neck.

“Should I go shave now?”

Phil curled in closer, tucking the duvet over both of them as he fitted his head into Dan’s neck. Dan’s scratchy cheek found it’s way to resting on his head. He gave a sleepy sigh, and relaxed in his boyfriend’s arms.

“Don’t even think about it.”
